analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassa nattika sāsa vaduka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo dhammo
analyzed: a nidassana appaṭigham sa āsavam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa āsavam dhammam paccayā na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
analyzed: na sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa āsavam dhammam paccayā

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa asavaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa asavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanāsavo dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham anāsavam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ca
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na anāsavaḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
